snippet: Joseph P. Kennedy III, a grandson of Robert F. Kennedy, has resigned his post as prosecutor to explore running for Congress for the seat being vacated by Barney Frank.
abstract: Joseph P Kennedy III, a grandson of Robert F Kennedy, resigns his post as prosecutor to explore running for Congress as a Democrat in Massachusetts's Fourth District, the seat being vacated by Barney Frank;
lead_paragraph: Joseph P. Kennedy III, a grandson of Robert F. Kennedy, has resigned his post as prosecutor to explore running for Congress for the seat being vacated by Barney Frank.

headline.seo: A Young Kennedy May Run for Office in Massachusetts
headline.main: A Young Kennedy Considers a Campaign
headline.print_headline: A Young Kennedy Considers a Campaign
